items.name: My Resume
items.htmlcontent: My handsome (general format) resume. Often, I modify or adjust my resume per job; this is the general, incomplete version. Please get in touch to see my latest, and most appropriate version.
items.author: Sabrina Voth

items.name: the STAB Project
items.htmlcontent:
My umbrella label for any punk-type interests I have. STAB itself can stand for a lot, but it started as 'Sabrina the Teenage Again Bitch'; a joke label I used for myself, going through my 'second puberty'.

However, it inspires me and gives me strength in dealing with a lot of personal struggles. Therefore, the STAB Project exists.
items.author: Sabrina Voth

items.name: Programming Samples
items.htmlcontent:
Besides my projects, any smaller bits of open-source programming I make can be founnd on my github page.

Generally speaking, I program as a means-to-an-end and have made solutions work via:

  • C# windows command line applications setup as scheduled tasks on servers
  • HTML and JS libraries wrapped up in an Apache Cordova tortilla to make an android/ios burrito
  • Magnificent, accountant ready SQL-query based reports that bordered on 'big data'
  • this website
items.author: Sabrina Voth

items.name: General Videos
items.htmlcontent:
Occasionally, I'll create various videos; usually an elaborate joke, sometimes more, sometimes even less.

If it's not worth mentioning on this page as a seperate item, you can check them out on my youtube channel.
items.author: Sabrina Voth

items.name: Intraline - Consent Form App
items.htmlcontent:
An application I was contracted to produce for Intraline; it features pdf generation, some wonderful simple design, and general helpfulness.

You can check out the project here

Please note that this project isn't currently completeled.
items.author: Sabrina Voth

items.name: Melissa (Atak 10 by Quest)
items.htmlcontent: A recent refugee from local thrift stores. Extremely worn, but she still has a lot to say. A vintage guitar from the 80's, smaller plywood body but with a standard scale and tremolo.
items.author: Sabrina Voth

content.name: Melissa - the Imp
content.desc: Something about the angling of her body give a sense of attitude and impishness.

content.name: Melissa - orignal decals
content.desc: Previous owners had adorned her with their clans markings, but unfortunately they had to be removed.

content.name: Melissa - namesake
content.desc: An older-seeming sticker introduces Melissa to the world.
